definition: plant or grow in a fixed cyclic order of succession
details:
verb
- plant or grow in a fixed cyclic order of succession
= example: plant or grow in a fixed cyclic order of succession
- perform a job or duty on a rotating basis
= example: perform a job or duty on a rotating basis
- turn on or around an axis or a center
= synonyms: go around, revolve
- turn outward
= synonyms: splay
- cause to turn on an axis or center
= synonyms: circumvolve
- exchange on a regular basis
= example: exchange on a regular basis
